problem_names:
lemma fmap_fplus:
  fixes f :: "'a \<rightarrow> 'b" and a b :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_plus"
  shows "fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b) = fplus\<cdot>(fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>a)\<cdot>(fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>b)"

lemma fplus_assoc:
  fixes a b c :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b)\<cdot>c = fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>b\<cdot>c)"

lemma bind_mplus:
  fixes a b :: "'a\<cdot>'m::monad_plus"
  shows "bind\<cdot>(mplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b)\<cdot>k = mplus\<cdot>(bind\<cdot>a\<cdot>k)\<cdot>(bind\<cdot>b\<cdot>k)"

lemma join_mplus:
  fixes xss yss :: "('a\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>'m::monad_plus"
  shows "join\<cdot>(mplus\<cdot>xss\<cdot>yss) = mplus\<cdot>(join\<cdot>xss)\<cdot>(join\<cdot>yss)"
translations:
lemma fmap_fplus:
  fixes f :: "'a \<rightarrow> 'b" and a b :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_plus"
  shows "fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b) = fplus\<cdot>(fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>a)\<cdot>(fmap\<cdot>f\<cdot>b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     ((udom \<rightarrow> udom) \<rightarrow>
      udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      ('a \<rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    fmapU\<cdot>
    f\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
     plusU\<cdot>
     a\<cdot>
     b) =
    COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      'b\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
      'b\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      ((udom \<rightarrow> udom) \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
       ('a \<rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
     fmapU\<cdot>
     f\<cdot>
     a)\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      ((udom \<rightarrow> udom) \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
       ('a \<rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
     fmapU\<cdot>
     f\<cdot>
     b)

lemma fplus_assoc:
  fixes a b c :: "'a\<cdot>'f::functor_plus"
  shows "fplus\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b)\<cdot>c = fplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>(fplus\<cdot>b\<cdot>c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
     plusU\<cdot>
     a\<cdot>
     b)\<cdot>
    c =
    COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    a\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
     plusU\<cdot>
     b\<cdot>
     c)

lemma bind_mplus:
  fixes a b :: "'a\<cdot>'m::monad_plus"
  shows "bind\<cdot>(mplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b)\<cdot>k = mplus\<cdot>(bind\<cdot>a\<cdot>k)\<cdot>(bind\<cdot>b\<cdot>k)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mplus\<cdot>a\<cdot>b \<bind> k =
    mplus\<cdot>(a \<bind> k)\<cdot>(b \<bind> k)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
      (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
      'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
      ('a \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
    bindU\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
       'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow> 'a\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
     plusU\<cdot>
     a\<cdot>
     b)\<cdot>
    k =
    COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
      'b\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
      'b\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
    plusU\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
       'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       ('a \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
     bindU\<cdot>
     a\<cdot>
     k)\<cdot>
    (COERCE
      (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
       'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
       ('a \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
     bindU\<cdot>
     b\<cdot>
     k)

lemma join_mplus:
  fixes xss yss :: "('a\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>'m::monad_plus"
  shows "join\<cdot>(mplus\<cdot>xss\<cdot>yss) = mplus\<cdot>(join\<cdot>xss)\<cdot>(join\<cdot>yss)"
